comments.body: Do we need to check migration feature gate at all? Should it only be the Unregister feature gate that is used?

Yeah... we will remove this after CSIMigrationvSphereComplete flag is removed. Otherwise yes, we do need to check because a combination of CSIMigrationvSphereComplete && CSIMigrationvSphere && CSIMigration will also lead to the unregister of the in-tree plugin
Ok can you add a comment that this check will be removed?
see comment in pkg/volume/csimigration/plugin_manager.go about how to make the helper function useful so we don't have to maintain the pluginName->feature mappings in multiple places
these could use the helper methods as well and not need to maintain feature mappings
